title: Sample, "Mayo", 1993
markings:
Printed on edge, a color register of 6 colors.
Printed on edge, "KAMINARI  DESIGNED  BY  NORIKO HIROSHIGE  FOR  KINNASAND."
Printed paper label removed and put into research folder.
dimensions:
Warp:  116 cm [45.5"]    Cut and stitched both ends.
Weft:  137.5 cm [54"]      Selvedge to selvedge.
creditline: Gift of Taunus Textildruck Zimmer GmbH & Co. KG
description: Horitzontal rows of a stylized tulip like flower in yellow and outlined in black, printed on shite fabric.
